description: It's time for a little rest and relaxation at Firefly Lagoon. Program Dash to play a game of Marco Polo with you.

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically say "On the way."
puzzles.introduction: Do you think Dash is ready to play?

hints.description: Drag out the sound state. Set the sound to "On the way." Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After speaking, make Dash instantly turn on green lights.

hints.description: Link the state with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dash to turn to your voice when you say "Marco!".
puzzles.introduction: When you say "Marco," Dash will turn to face you.

hints.description: Drag out the Voice Turn state. Link the state with a Voice Heard cue.

puzzles.description: After turning toward your voice, make Dash automatically turn on yellow lights.

hints.description: Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on yellow lights, make Dash automatically say "Polo" (or whatever you record).
puzzles.introduction: Let's record "Polo" and have Dash say it when you say "Marco."

hints.description: Drag out a Custom Sound state. Record "Polo" (or something else) as the sound. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After saying "Polo," make Dash instantly move forward 50 cm.
puzzles.introduction: Make Dash come toward you while saying "Polo."

hints.description: Drag out the Move To state. Set the distance to 50 cm in the forward direction. Link the state with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After moving forward, make Dash automatically turn on green lights again.
puzzles.introduction: Loop it back to keep playing.

hints.description: Link the states with an Auto cue.
